channel.title: Projects on Daylam Tayari
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Daylam Tayari

item.title: TwitchRecover
item.description: Tool with over 600K downloads which recovers and downloads all VODs, clips, streams, and highlights, including those are sub-only or deleted.

item.title: Transit Display
item.description: An RGB LED matrix display that shows transit and commute ETAs using CTA, Divvy, and Transit app APIs.

item.title: Microsoft to Do Export
item.description: A solution to export tasks and lists from Microsoft To Do into a Todoist or JSON format.

item.title: Nmap2tex
item.description: Formatting tool that converts Nmap scans into a services, user, and vulnerability LaTeX report.

item.title: Pi Hole Blocklist
item.description: Pi-hole blocklist that compiles millions of trackers, advertisements, spams, and fishing domains.

item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: A compilation of my configurations for my shell environment and various programs I use on a daily basis.
